Introduction
============

``oasi-ozone-forecaster`` is a package for the forecast of the next day ozone maximum hourly concentration in Ticino, Switzerland. 

This is achieved through a ML approach which is trained on a set of both measured and forecasted meteorological values from 2015 to 2021.

How to use
**********

To execute the scripts, first refer to the following basic instructions:

1. Clone the repo: ``git clone https://github.com/supsi-dacd-isaac/oasi-ozone-forecaster.git``
2. Move to the newly created directory: ``cd oasi-ozone-forecaster``
3. Create `logs` directory: ``mkdir logs/``
4. Create a virtual environment: ``python3 -m venv venv/``
5. Install the necessary packages: ``venv/bin/python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt``

Then, refer to the :ref:`Main scripts` page and the descriptions therein.
